HintCategory.Title: Repairing the Cable on the Tower
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the tower and LOOK at the broken power cable
MOVE the box at the base of the tower
LOOK at the locked shed in the compound area
Go inside the guard house and OPEN the locker on the right side
Find and GET the <ROSWELL PADLOCK KEY> on the floor of the locker
USE the <ROSWELL PADLOCK KEY> on the shed padlock, open the door and enter
Find and GET the <TOOLBOX> on the shelf in the shed
EXAMINE the <TOOLBOX>
Get across the Laserfield (See Directory)
Find and GET the <POWER CABLE> by the entrance to the tunnel on the far side of the laserfield
COMBINE the <WIRE STRIPPERS> with the <POWER CABLE>
USE the <STRIPPED POWER CABLE> on the broken power cable
Go to the power box by the guard house and MOVE the lever (to ON)

HintCategory.Title: Getting Across the Laserfield
HintCategory.Hint: Go into the compound area and LOOK at the card reader next to the laserfield door
Go into the guardhouse and OPEN the nightstand drawer near the beds
GET the <ROSWELL SECURITY CARD>
USE the <ROSWELL SECURITY CARD> on the card reader
LOOK at the laserfield control system directly across from the laserfield door
Go into the guard house and get the <LASER FIELD DIAGRAM> that is partially hidden under the bottom mattress
EXAMINE the <LASER FIELD DIAGRAM>
Turn ON the laserfield control system

Solve the puzzle to get access to the laserfield, then follow the blue path through the laserfield. To bypass this puzzle: with the puzzle on the scren, type 253. Warning!: Doing this will reduce your score by 100 points

HintCategory.Title: Opening the Door to the Underground Complex
HintCategory.Hint: Try to OPEN the steel doors
Get into the Emergency Bunker in the Guard House (See Directory)
Find and OPEN the trap door on the floor of the Emergency Bunker
GET the <DYNAMITE BOX>
EXAMINE the <DYNAMITE BOX>
In the Guard House, find and GET the <MATCHBOX> on the night stand next to the beds
In the compound, find and GET the <FUSE> on top of the box near the shed that cannot be opened
COMBINE the <DYNAMITE> with the <FUSE>
COMBINE the <DYNAMITE WITH FUSE> with the <MATCHBOX>
Get across the Laserfield (See Directory)
USE the <LIT DYNAMITE> on the door
Run away!

HintCategory.Title: Exploring with the 'Abductor'
HintCategory.Hint: Once inside the duct area, EXAMINE the <LIVE ABDUCTOR WITH REMOTE> and press ON

Look at the reference numbers located throughout the ductwork to keep track of where you are. Find your way to the 2nd level and search to find the four retrievable objects in rooms found at the end of the airducts. To retrieve objects, place your cursor over the object. When the cursor turns red, press the 'Activate Arm' button. If it can be retrieved, it will be added to your inventory. To avoid being hit by the fan blades, elevate as high as possible and fly over the fan between the blades

HintCategory.Title: Eliminating the Alien Entity
HintCategory.Hint: Find and LOOK at the Dorm door on level 1
Go to the Compound (outside), find and GET the <SHOVEL> next to the locked storage shed
USE the <SHOVEL> on the Dorm door and enter the Dorm
Find and GET the <CD> on the floor near the door
Find and GET the <DISC PLAYER> in one of the storage drawers in the sleeping area
COMBINE the <CD> with the <DISC PLAYER>
EXAMINE the <DISC PLAYER WITH CD>
Find and GET the <CONTAINMENT UNIT> in one of the storage drawers in the Dorm
COMBINE the <CONTAINMENT UNIT> with the <CONTAINMENT SCRAP> found in the safe at the Waterfront Warehouse
Turn on the backup generator in the Generator Room (See Directory)
Leave the Generator Room and listen for the generator to shut off
Rush back to the generator and USE the <OPEN CONTAINMENT UNIT> on the dormant alien entity

HintCategory.Title: Turning on the Backup Generator in the Generator Room
HintCategory.Hint: Find and OPEN the door to the Generator Room on Level 1
LOOK at the generator
Find and OPEN the door to the Mess Hall on Level 1
OPEN the upper cabinet in the kitchen area
GET the <POT>
OPEN the freezer door on the refrigerator on the left
GET the <ICE PICK>
Find and OPEN storage room door 104 on Level 1
USE the <ICE PICK> on the partially full fuel drum
USE the <POT> on the fuel leaking from the opened fuel drum
Go to the Mess Hall and USE the <POT OF DIESEL FUEL> on the right stove
Turn ON the stove
GET the <LIQUIFIED FUEL> from the stove
Go to the generator and MOVE the fuel cap
USE the <LIQUIFIED FUEL> on the gas spout of the generator
Find the fuel prime handle and MOVE it three times to turn ON the generator
Get the generator to work (See Directory)

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Generator to Work
HintCategory.Hint: OPEN the larger cover on the backup generator
Try to turn on the generator by moving the green button
Find and OPEN the door to the storage room 102 on Level 1
Find and GET the <BOX OF SPARK PLUGS>
Go to the Generator Room and OPEN the smaller cover on the generator to reveal a cylinder head
EXAMINE the <BOX OF SPARK PLUGS> and USE the <SPARK PLUG> on the cylinder head
Turn ON the generator

HintCategory.Title: Getting Into the War Room
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the door to the War Room on Level 2
Go to the Dormitory on Level 1
Find the jammed open door and LOOK at the <ROSWELL ID BADGE> lying on the floor behind the door - this is difficult to find so look carefully
Go to the Rec Hall on Level 1 and find and GET the <DART> in the dartboard on the wall
In the Rec Hall on Level 1, find and GET the <POOL CUE> by the pool table
Go to the Dorm on Level 1 and find and GET the <DUCT TAPE> in one of the storage drawers in the sleeping area
COMBINE the <DART> with the <POOL CUE>
COMBINE the <DUCT TAPE> with the <DART WITH POOL CUE>
USE the <MAKESHIFT SPEAR> on the <ROSWELL ID BADGE>
Go to the door to the War Room on Level 2 and USE the <ROSWELL ID BADGE> on the panel

HintCategory.Title: Getting to Level 3 of the Roswell Underground Complex
HintCategory.Hint: Find and LOOK at the Elevator to Level 3 (by the Metallurgy lab)
Use the Abductor (See Directory)
From the ventilation fan, find a down arrow (near sign J1-5) in the ducts to take you to the 2nd level
Find the duct shaft directly opposite from the reference sign J2-3. Follow this shaft to the Linguistics Lab
Using the Abductor Arm, find and pick up the <PASSCARD> on a computer console in the Linguistics Lab
USE the <RED PASSCARD> on the panel by the elevator to Level 3
Defuse the Explosive Device in the Level 3 Elevator (See Directory)
In the elevator to go to Level 3, push the Level 3 button

HintCategory.Title: Using the `Abductor'
HintCategory.Hint: Find and GET the Alien <ABDUCTOR> from the conversation pit in the Rec Hall on level 1
Get into the War Room (See Directory)
Find and GET the <ADBUCTOR REMOTE> in the War Room, under the Video Projector
Return to the compound (outside), TRAVEL to the Electronics Shop and LOOK at the <ROBCO BATTERY PACK>
Ask Zack about the <ROBCO BATTERY PACK>
Buy the <ROBCO BATTERY PACK> from Zack for $20
COMBINE the Alien <ABDUCTOR> with the <ROBCO BATTERY PACK>
COMBINE the <LIVE ABDUCTOR> with the <ABDUCTOR REMOTE>
In the Rec Hall, find and GET the <FREE WEIGHT BAR> in the workout area
On level 1, OPEN the door at the end of the hall just past the Rec Hall
LOOK at the ventilation fan
USE the <FREE WEIGHT BAR> on the ventilation fan
USE the <LIVE ABDUCTOR WITH REMOTE> on the fan

HintCategory.Title: Defusing the Explosive Device in the Level 3 Elevator
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the red and blue wires on the panel in the elevator to Level 3
Use the Abductor (See Directory)
From the ventilation fan, find a down arrow (near sign J1-5) in the ducts to take you to the 2nd level
Find the duct shaft directly opposite from the reference sign J2-12 and follow this shaft to the Computer Science Lab
Using the Abductor Arm, find and pick up the <PHILLIPS SCREWDRIVER> on the floor near the tipped-over chair
USE the <PHILLIPS SCREWDRIVER> on the panel in the elevator to Level 3
OPEN the panel
In the Generator Room on Level 1, find and GET the <WIRE CUTTERS> from on top of the box
USE the <WIRE CUTTERS> on the red and blue wires
GET the <EXPLOSIVE DEVICE>
Find the Waste Disposal Unit mounted on the wall near the Bio Lab area and OPEN it
USE the <EXPLOSIVE DEVICE> on the open Waste Disposal Unit

HintCategory.Title: Getting into Locked Inventory Storage Area 101-200
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the Locked Storage Area (Items 101-200) on Level 3
Find and GET the <ACETYLENE TORCH HANDLE> on a shelf in Storage Room 104 on Level 1
Find and GET the <PLASTIC CASE> in Storage Room 102 on Level 1
EXAMINE the <PLASTIC CASE>
Find and GET the <OXYGEN TANK> in the corner of the Generator Room on Level 1
Find and GET the <ACETYLENE TANK> on a shelf in the Miscellaneous Storage Room on Level 3
Find and GET the <STRIKER> hanging on the side of a crate in the Miscellaneous Storage Room on Level 3
Use the Abductor (See Directory)
From the ventilation fan, find a down arrow (near sign J1-5) in the ducts to take you to the 2nd level
Find the Duct shaft directly opposite from the reference sign J2-8 and follow this shaft to the Metallurgy Lab
With the abductor arm, find and pick up the <HOSES> on the wall in the Metallurgy Lab.
COMBINE the <HOSES> with the <OXYGEN TANK>.
COMBINE the <OXYGEN TANK, HOSES> with the <ACETYLENE TANK>
COMBINE the <ACETYLENE TORCH HANDLE> with the <ACETYLENE TORCH CUTTING TIP>
COMBINE the <ACETYLENE TORCH> with the <TANKS AND HOSES>
COMBINE the <ACETYLENE KIT> with the <STRIKER>
USE the <LIT ACETYLENE TORCH> on the lock on the door to Storage Area (Items 101-200)

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Power Cell (Item #186)
What to do after Roswell
HintCategory.Hint: Go to Tex's office and check the vid-phone for messages

HintCategory.Title: Turning off the Alarm in Witt's Apartment
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the alarm panel by the door to Witt's apartment
Find and MOVE the death mask on the wall to the left of the bookcase
MOVE the switch behind the death mask
MOVE the switch behind the tree by the table and chairs
Find and LOOK at the alarm switch high on the wall above the fireplace
Find and GET a <BAMBOO POLE> from the pot beside the fireplace
USE the <BAMBOO POLE> on the alarm switch to turn it off
Ride the lift to the loft
MOVE the plant on top of the dresser to the right of the bed
MOVE the alarm switch

HintCategory.Title: Searching Witt's Apartment
HintCategory.Hint: Turn off the alarm in Witt's apartment (See Directory)
LOOK at the stone statue in the corner by the fireplace
Find and LOOK at the keyhole on the stone statue
MOVE the tree on the left side of the fireplace
MOVE the diamond design on the wall to the left of the fireplace to turn off the flames in the fireplace
Ride the lift to the loft
GET the <TWEEZERS> from on top of the dresser to the left of the bed
Go to the fireplace and USE the <TWEEZERS> on the <FOIL PACKET>
EXAMINE the <FOIL PACKET>
USE the <COPPER KEY> on the keyhole in the stone statue
Solve the slider puzzle in the stone statue (See Directory)
Go to the open bookcase and find and GET <WITT'S PUZZLE BOX>

HintCategory.Title: Solving the Slider Puzzle in the Stone Statue
HintCategory.Hint: In the bedroom loft, find and GET the <SCRAPBOOK> in the bottom drawer of the dresser on the right
EXAMINE the <SCRAPBOOK>
EXAMINE the <PHOTOGRAPH OF WITT'S STATUE>
Find and LOOK at the chart on the wall by the masks

Arrange the tiles to correspond to the numbers on the back of the <PHOTOGRAPH OF WITT'S STATUE>. To bypass this puzzle: with the puzzle on the screen, type 204. Warning!: Doing this will reduce your score by 100 points

HintCategory.Title: Opening Witt's Puzzle Box
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE <WITT'S PUZZLE BOX>
Find and GET <WITT'S NOTES> on the bed in the loft
EXAMINE <WITT'S NOTES>
Find and GET the <CALENDAR BOOK> to the right of the sofa
EXAMINE the <CALENDAR BOOK>
Find and GET the <CULTURE BOOK> to the left of the sofa
EXAMINE the <CULTURE BOOK>
Find and GET a <BAMBOO POLE> from the pot beside the fireplace
While standing in the loft, use the <BAMBOO POLE> on the <PLAQUE> on the wall above the alarm panel
EXAMINE the <PLAQUE>
To bypass this puzzle: with the puzzle on the screen, type 514. Warning!: Doing this will reduce your score by 200 points

HintCategory.Title: Opening the Puzzle Box from the Garden House
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE <GARDEN HOUSE PUZZLE BOX>
Open Witt's puzzle box (See Directory)
EXAMINE <WITT'S UNLOCKED PUZZLE BOX>
COMBINE the <ONYX PIECES> with <GARDEN HOUSE PUZZLE BOX>

Place the onyx pieces in the grooves on the box. To bypass this puzzle: with the puzzle on the screen, pick up a piece with the left mouse button and type 928. Warning!: Doing this will reduce your score by 200 points

HintCategory.Title: The Pandora Device
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the Cosmic Connection and Talk to Archie Ellis
Open the <DEMAGNETIZED PUZZLE BOX> (See Directory)
EXAMINE <UNLOCKED DEMAGNETIZED BOX>
Find out about Item #186 (See Directory)
Find the Power Cell (Item #186) (See Directory)
Find all the boxes Malloy sent (See Directory)
Open Witt's puzzle box (See Directory)
EXAMINE <WITT'S UNLOCKED PUZZLE BOX>
Open the puzzle box from the Garden House (See Directory)
EXAMINE <GARDEN HOUSE UNLOCKED BOX>
COMBINE the <INCOMPLETE PANDORA DEVICE> by combining all of the device pieces from the puzzle boxes
COMBINE the <ASSEMBLED PANDORA DEVICE> with the <POWER CELL>
EXAMINE the <PANDORA DEVICE W/POWER CELL
Go to Tex's office

HintCategory.Title: Assembling the Map in the Snake Chamber
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the Labyrinth Map Altar
Find and GET the 14 pieces of the Labyrinth Map scattered high and low around the chamber
USE a piece of the map on the altar
Assemble the pieces. To bypass this puzzle: with the puzzle on the screen, pick up a piece with the left mouse button and type 962. Warning!: Doing this will reduce your score by 100 points

HintCategory.Title: Getting through the Mayan Labyrinth
HintCategory.Hint: Assemble the map in the Snake Chamber (See Directory)

OPEN the door behind the round stone with the stars symbol above it and leave the Snake Chamber. Go to the first intersection and turn right. At the end of the passage turn left, go all the way to the end and turn left again. Take yet another left, and LOOK at the dead man
Find and GET the <PRESCRIPTION GLASSES> by Edsen
Find and GET the <LANTERN> by Edsen
Find and GET the <GUN> by Edsen
Find and GET the <HANDKERCHIEF> by Edsen
Turn around and go back the way you came in (two right turns), then go into the first opening on the right. Find and GET the <WHITE DAGGER>

Turn around, go back to the intersection, turn right and go to the end of the passage. Turn right, then go into the first opening on the right. Follow the passage to the dead end (three right turns), find and GET the <SMALL STONE BOWL>

Turn around and go out the way you came in (three left turns). At the first intersection, turn right and go to the end of the passage. Turn right and follow the passage (through a right turn and a left turn). Go into the first opening on the right, then follow the passage to the end (two left turns). Climb the stairs and LOOK at the skeleton
EXAMINE the <PRESCRIPTION GLASSES>
USE the <BROKEN LENS> on the <HEMP CORD> wrapped around the skeltons hand
GET the <HEMP CORD>
GET the <MAYAN SPEAR>
Turn around and go out the way you came in (right, right, left, right, left). Go to the end of the passage, turn left, open the door to the Snake Chamber and enter

Open the door directly across the chamber with the sun symbol above it and leave through it. Follow the passage (through a left turn, then a right turn) and go to the intersection. Turn right, turn left, then left again. Go into the first opening on the right, take another right, find and GET the <BLUNT HATCHET>
Turn around and go back the way you came in and return to the intersection. Turn right, then go into the next opening on the right. Turn right, find and GET the <SILVER DAGGER>

Turn around and go back the way you came in (two left hand turns). Go to the end of the passage, take two right turns, then go all the way to the end of the long passage. Turn right, climb the stairs, open the door with the symbol of two birds on it, and enter the Bird Chamber
Solve the Sound Stones Puzzle in the Bird Chamber (See Directory)

Open the door across from the monolith with the stars symbol above it and leave the Bird Chamber. Follow the passage (through a left turn, then a right turn), go to the end of the passage, then turn left. Go to the end of the passage, take a left turn, two right turns, and a left turn. Find and GET the <GOLD DAGGER>

Turn around and go back the way you came in (right, left, left, right), then go into the first opening on the right. Follow the passage (turn right, then left) to the door with the wasp symbol. OPEN the door and enter the Wasp Chamber
Get rid of the wasps in the Wasp Chamber (See Directory)
Solve the 3 Mayan Kings puzzle in the Wasp Chamber (See Directory)
Open the door under the moon symbol and leave the Wasp Chamber. Go to the intersection, turn right, then left, then right. Go to the end of the passage, turn right, find and GET the <RED DAGGER>
Turn around, turn left, then go into the next opening on the left. Open the door with the dagger symbol and enter the Dagger Chamber
Solve the 5 daggers puzzle in the Dagger Chamber (See Directory)

Open the door behind the 3-legged monolith with the black sun symbol above it and leave the Dagger Chamber. Go to the end of the passage, turn right, right, left, OPEN the door with the pentagon symbol and enter

HintCategory.Title: Solving the Sound Stones Puzzle
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the Sound Stones Altar
LOOK at the art on the walls of the Bird Chamber for hints to solving the puzzle
USE the <BLUNT HATCHET> on the Sound Stones Altar
Use the Blunt Hatchet on the Sound Stones in the correct sequence. To bypass this puzzle: with the puzzle on the screen, type 962. Warning!: Doing this will reduce your score by 100 points

HintCategory.Title: Getting Rid of the Wasps in the Wasp Chamber
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the Stone Wasp Head high up on the wall in the Wasp Chamber
EXAMINE the <LANTERN>
COMBINE the <HANDKERCHIEF> with the <LANTERN FUEL>
COMBINE the <OILY HANDKERCHIEF> with <MAYAN SPEAR>
COMBINE the <SPEAR, OILY HANDKERCHIEF> with <MATCHBOX>
USE <FIERY SPEAR> on the Stone Wasp Head

HintCategory.Title: Solving the 3 Mayan Kings Puzzle in the Wasp Chamber
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the Altar in the Wasp Chamber
LOOK at the art on the walls of the chamber for hints to solving the puzzle
Find and GET the <KING TILES> on the floor by the altar
USE the <KING TILES> on the Altar

Arrange the King Tiles in the correct sequence. To bypass this puzzle: with the puzzle on the screen, pick up a piece with the left mouse button and type 749. Warning!: Doing this will reduce your score by 100 points

HintCategory.Title: Solving the 5 Daggers Puzzle in the Dagger Chamber
HintCategory.Hint: LOOK at the 5 Daggers Altar
Find and GET the <BLACK DAGGER> leaning against one of the benches.
LOOK at the totem art on the walls of the chamber for hints to solving the puzzle
USE one of the daggers on the altar.

Insert the daggers into the slots in the correct sequence. To bypass this puzzle: with the puzzle on the screen, pick up a piece with the left mouse button and type 350. Warning!: Doing this will reduce your score by 100 points

HintCategory.Title: Getting Past the Fireballs
Solving the 5 Chamber Symbols Puzzle in the Pentagon Chamber
Getting Out of the Ascension Chamber
HintCategory.Hint: Find and GET <REGAN'S BACKPACK> in the corner on the floor
EXAMINE <REGAN'S BACKPACK>
USE the <ROPE> on the statue
TALK to Regan
LOOK at the statue fragments
EXAMINE the <GUN>
EXAMINE the <BULLETS>
COMBINE the <JACKKNIFE> with the <BULLETS>
EXAMINE the <JACKKNIFE WITH BULLETS>
COMBINE the <SMALL STONE BOWL> with the <GUNPOWDER>
COMBINE <HEMP CORD> with <LANTERN FUEL>
COMBINE <PRIMITIVE FUSE> with <PRIMITIVE EXPLOSIVE>
COMBINE <MATCHBOX> with <PRIMITIVE EXPLOSIVE, FUSE>

GET <STATUE FRAGMENT #1>
USE <STATUE FRAGMENT #1> on one of the undepressed square stones
GET <STATUE FRAGMENT #2>
USE <STATUE FRAGMENT #2> on a second undepressed square stone

HintCategory.Title: Getting Past the Darts in the Passageway
Operating the Console in the Spacecraft
HintCategory.Hint: Click on the Black Sun Symbol at the top of the console
Press the following buttons in order: North, Circle, Red
Press the following buttons in order: East, Cross, Orange
Press the following buttons in order: South, Triangle, Yellow
Press the following buttons in order: West, Square, Green

HintCategory.Title: Creating a portable map of the Mayan Labyrinth
HintCategory.Hint: Assemble the map in the Snake Chamber (See Directory)
In the Snake Chamber, find and GET the <PAPYRUS> on top of the bench
Open the door with the Black Sun symbol above it and exit the chamber
In the Labyrinth Hallway, find and GET the <CHARCOAL> on the floor of the passage
Go back to the Snake Chamber
COMBINE the <PAPYRUS> with the <CHARCOAL>
EXAMINE the <PAPYRUS DRAWING> to get through the labyrinth

Enter the code 1-0-9-1, then press Enter
